      • Backspace

        public void Backspace()
        This method erases a number on Textfield.

      • process

        public void process(java.lang.String a)
        This method selects a operator. If ArrayList inputStr is empty, it saves first number and operator If user inputs a operator countinously, it will change the operator into new operaotr and will not calculator If ArrayList inputStr has a equal, it will erase the equal and set new operator

      • addValue

        public java.lang.String addValue(java.lang.String a)
        This method shows a number on the Textfield. Before user inputs a operator If user input a point before a number, it will show "0." After user inputs a operator If user input a point before a number, it will show "0." Before user inputs a point If user input a number, it will multiply Textfield by 10 then add String a After user inputs a point If user input a number, it will add String a to Textfield.

      • getNumber

        public double getNumber(java.lang.String a)
        This method changes String a into Double. If String a is integer, this method will erase the point and change String a into Double.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.Double a)
        This method returns Double a into String

      • hideAfterPoint

        public java.lang.String hideAfterPoint(java.lang.String a)
        This method hides 0 if a String is integer If String a is not Double, it is erase 0 after the point

      • hasMemory

        public boolean hasMemory()
